metadata.title: CVE-2020-15591 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
fexsrv in F*EX (aka Frams' Fast File EXchange) before fex-20160919_2 allows eval injection (for unauthenticated remote code execution).

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-15591` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

fex - 20160919-2
fex-utils - 20160919-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: fex package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '20160919-2').
